channel.title: Comments on: Star Trek Inspirational Posters

item.title: By: joseph
item.dc:creator: joseph
item.description:
We got a good laugh out of these at the office. We printed out "EXPENDABILITY":
Kirk, Spock, McCoy, and Ensign Ricky are beaming down to the planet. Guess who's not coming back.
item.content:encoded:
We got a good laugh out of these at the office. We printed out “EXPENDABILITY”:

Kirk, Spock, McCoy, and Ensign Ricky are beaming down to the planet. Guess who’s not coming back.

item.title: By: Deane
item.dc:creator: Deane
item.description: Seriously, dude, I almost peed myself laughing so hard. I printed out the "awesome" one of Kirk, and have it hanging next to my desk. Good Lord.
item.content:encoded: Seriously, dude, I almost peed myself laughing so hard. I printed out the “awesome” one of Kirk, and have it hanging next to my desk. Good Lord.
